attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who are claiming benifits and are able to work should be made to work in the community before recieving their money.
We think they should be made to sign on at the town hall or a similar place and have to go out with a supervisor and work,eg cleaning streets,gardening for the elderly
or anything to benifit community. I am sure they soon find employment.

rejection.details: Petition main sentence reads is currently petitioning the PM “...to Keith Dunn”. This will need to be redrafted.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
